properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 8:09PM MST until January 13 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque NM
properties.description:
...ACCUMULATING LIGHT SNOW WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN NEW
MEXICO TONIGHT THROUGH TOMORROW AFTERNOON...

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches
in the northern Tusas Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45
mph.

* WHERE...Tusas Mountains Including Chama.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 4 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could
bring down tree branches.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for New Mexico can be obtained by
calling 5 1 1, 1-800-432-4269, or visiting nmroads.com.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 4 PM MST MONDAY
